attributes.action: Please extend self assessment deadline by 2 months to March 2021
attributes.additional_details: The government is here to help the general public and with the current situation where one us has suffered one or the other, by extending it 2 months you will be helping a lot of people
attributes.background: The government has helped a lot of sectors but accountants and book keepers have suffered as well. You have help limited companies by extending their deadline by 3 months please do the right thing and extend the self assessment to 31 March

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558528

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
